name: gozareshyar-monorepo
description: AI-powered mobile assistant for project reporters and managers

scripts.build: pnpm --filter shared build && pnpm --filter backend build && pnpm --filter frontend build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter shared test && pnpm --filter backend test && pnpm --filter frontend test
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter shared lint && pnpm --filter backend lint && pnpm --filter frontend lint
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter shared clean && pnpm --filter backend clean && pnpm --filter frontend clean
scripts.type-check: pnpm --filter shared type-check && pnpm --filter backend type-check && pnpm --filter frontend type-check

author: Erfan Masoudi
